ISSUE.TITLE: No data fetched in mobile browsers (zalando specific)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When I go to http://zalando.github.io/zalando.github.io-dev/ via a browser in a mobile phone then all numbers are zeros as well as no repositories are shown. Solution: Provide https://catwatch-web.hackweek.zalan.do with a proper TLS certificate (not a self-signed one).

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: some preliminary form of sorting and limiting of the results currently not configurable through parameters

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #1 from nan-wang/stat_master Stat master
